summary: SEVERAL TIMES THE VEHICLE WOULD LOOSE POWER AND SHUT DOWN THE POWER STEERING WHILE ATTEMPTING TO PARK OR TURN AROUND IN DRIVEWAY.. ON TIMES,ONLY WARNINGS WOULD FLASH UP ON THE INFORMATION DISPLAY ABOUT LOSE OF SYSTEMS AND THE DOOR LOCKS WOULD CYCLE. OCCASIONALLY, THE TURN SIGNALS WOULD SHUT OFF THE CRUSE CONTROL.
